job.title: Product Analyst
job.description:
What you’ll be doing

  • Work as the proxy product owner, as required, representing the best interests of your client to build user stories and sprint goal
  • Represent ANDigital as the expert in Digital and eCommerce functional and design capability, helping your client to create and deliver outstanding product
  • Design compelling and commercially viable customer experiences, crossing multiple digital and eCommerce channels
  • Work with your scrum team members to Identify the technology solutions required to deliver the digital experience
  • Liaise between client and third parties as required to deliver exceptional digital and eCommerce products
  • Work within a high performing multi-discipline team, from user experience and creative to development and testing.
  • Develop our people and act as a role model for ANDigital

Must-have's

  • Excellent knowledge and passion for digital across mobile, social and eCommerce channels
  • Strategic thinker and problem solver – can offer solutions to complex challenges
  • Solid experience of Agile delivery techniques, particularly utilising Scrum frameworks
  • Previous product analysis experience gained either in house or within a consultancy
  • Previous experience designing digital customer experiences, across social, mobile and eCommerce channels
  • Excellent written, verbal communication, facilitation and presentation skills
  • Strong stakeholder management techniques and with a demonstrable track record
  • Ability to coach and develop team members – both client and ANDigital
  • Passion for working collaboratively within and thriving in a multi-disciplinary team environment
  • A strong, relevant graduate degree

Nice-to-haves

  • A background in digital or eCommerce strategy, delivery or marketing operations
  • Knowledge of digital and eCommerce technology applications including architecture and methods
  • Commercial Experience creating businesses cases for digital and eCommerce projects
  • Experience of market leading technology packages e.g. content management, eCommerce, search, social, mobile
  • First-hand experience of product development and business transformation in a digital or eCommerce context
  • Experience of working closely with digital and creative professionals either in-house or with 3rd parties
  • A broad understanding of the technology applications and vendors with which our clients operate

Benefits

  • Market leading package, bonus and equity
  • Join a growing, professional and driven squad team
  • Make a huge impact in creating a unique company
  • Learn, develop and grow a part of a fast growing company
  • Have fun in relaxed environment where everyone is valued
job.briefdescription: The Product Analyst will work as part of a Scrum team, within a digital/eCommerce context, adopting the ANDigital Agile methods. As the expert in digital and e-commerce functional and design capability, the product analyst will help the client deliver outstanding products by developing technical solutions that best fit the business needs.

job.title: Product Developer
job.description:
What you’ll be doing

  • Work with our clients in a multi-skilled Agile delivery team to design, architect and develop digital and e-commerce products
  • Apply our own take on Enterprise Agile Delivery – the ANDapproach, adopting Scrum and XP techniques to develop great products for leading UK businesses
  • Work with bespoke and innovative software platforms and components to turn your hand to front end, back end and mobile web and application development
  • Design and develop compelling and commercially viable customer experiences across multiple digital and e-commerce channels: web, mobile, social, in-store
  • Set up strong foundations – architect and design the solution, with one eye on the IT roadmap
  • Adopt Test Driven Development (TDD) and software testing techniques throughout each build sprint
  • Use and promote test and build automation to improve efficiency and quality
  • Adopt Continuous Integration and Delivery techniques throughout the delivery lifecycle
  • Demonstrate your product with pride at the end of each sprint
  • Develop our clients and less experienced ANDigital employees, providing coaching and acting as a role model

Must-haves

  • Strong organisational skills, with a passion to work collaboratively within and in a multi-disciplinary Agile team environment
  • Responsive web development experience including as a minimum CSS 3, HTML5, jQuery and JavaScript
  • Back end experience Java 7 and frameworks - Struts, Spring and Hibernate with full LAMP experience from install to development and deployment
  • Mobile app development experience covering native iOS and Android or utilise frameworks such as Titanium and PhoneGap
  • e-commerce application development experience with platforms such as Oracle ATG, IBM WebSphere Commerce and Hybris
  • Implementation experience with Content Management, Search and Merchandising and Order Management applications.
  • Excellent written and verbal communication and presentation skills
  • A good graduate degree in computer science
  • Strategic thinker and problem solver

Nice-to-haves

  • Extreme Programming (XP) experience within an Agile delivery framework
  • Experience of working closely with digital and creative professionals
  • A broad understanding of the technology and vendors with which our clients operate
  • Previous experience of integrating digital products with middleware applications
  • Consultancy/professional services

Benefits:

  • Market leading package, bonus and equity
  • Join a growing, professional and driven squad team
  • Make a huge impact in creating a unique company
  • Learn, develop and grow a part of a fast growing company
  • Have fun in relaxed environment where everyone is valued
job.briefdescription: The Product Developer will work within an agile team designing and developing commercially viable products that deliver exceptional customer experiences for the end user. As the expert in product development in the areas of digital and e-commerce, the product developer will work with bespoke and innovative platforms getting involved in front end, back end and mobile web and application development.

job.title: Squad Lead
job.description:
What you’ll be doing

  • Represent ANDigital as the most senior member of the team while onsite with the client
  • Work hand in hand with clients to formulate and deliver exceptional digital and e-commerce products through the adoption of Enterprise Agile delivery framework
  • Support, lead and inspire our ANDigital delivery teams as part of ongoing client engagements
  • Coach and mentor our delivery teams in best practice Enterprise Agile delivery frameworks suitable to the client organisation
  • Provide direct line management for your multi-skilled team of up to 12 people, covering UX, development and product owner roles
  • Provide coaching and mentoring to the team members – mix of ANDigital and client people, across product owners, analysts, developers, UX, Dev Ops and testers
  • Undertake important management activities for the professionals in your team, including communications, mentoring, skills development, performance management, scheduling and people management

Must-haves

  • Good grounding in more traditional delivery methods such as Prince 2, MSP and PMI, potentially utilised in combination with Agile software development
  • Track record of delivering significant e-commerce and digital projects in either B2B or B2C environments
  • Strong comprehension and understanding of digital and e-commerce from both a commercial and technology perspective
  • Great stakeholder management experience, working with clients or internal customers across all corporate functions and levels
  • Servant leadership style – able to meet clients’ needs whilst empowering the team to self-organise and deliver on their commitments
  • Significant experience of line managing, coaching and leading a multi-skilled team covering a mix of technology, digital and commercial roles
  • Excellent written and verbal communication and presentation skills
  • A good graduate degree in computer science
  • Strategic thinker and problem solver

Nice-to-Have's

  • Scrum Master qualification from Scrum Alliance or Scrum.org
  • Traditional Programme Delivery qualifications such as Prince 2 or MSP
  • Experience of working closely with digital and creative professionals
  • A broad understanding of the technology and vendors with which our clients operate
  • Previous experience of integrating digital products with middleware applications
  • Consultancy/professional services

Benefits

  • Join a growing, professional and driven squad team
  • Market leading package, bonus and equity
  • Make a huge impact in creating a unique company
  • Learn, develop and grow a part of a fast growing company
  • Have fun in relaxed environment where everyone is valued
job.briefdescription: The Squad Lead will partner closely with the client to formulate and deliver exceptional digital and e-commerce products. As the most senior member at the client site, the Squad Lead will coach, lead and manage the ANDigital multi-disciplined team through Enterprise Agile delivery frameworks.

job.title: Professionalising Digital Lead
job.description:
What you’ll be doing

  • Work with our clients to professionalise the digital operating model and organisational capabilities to deliver their digital objectives
  • Support and help manage the digital organisation transformation to align with the broader client business strategy
  • Work with clients to build their people capability, identifying current skills gaps and opportunities for upskilling
  • Build functional models to determine clear accountabilities and responsibilities by role for a digital or eCommerce team
  • Define and build digital and eCommerce job descriptions, competency models and career paths, utilising external best practice where required
  • Work with clients to define their day to day ways of working, governance practices and processes to underpin the digital ambitions
  • Develop strong relationships with stakeholders, clients and suppliers to align objectives both inside and outside of the Digital or eCommerce functions.
  • Maintain a clear knowledge of emerging digital trends and relevant new technologies that will influence organisational capabilities

Must-haves

  • Has worked for a professional services business, delivering structural organisational change for leading corporate clients
  • Previous experience of culture change and operating model change programmes – ability to apply good practices to support digital/IT leaders with driving and embedding change in their teams and broader organisation
  • Experience of working with senior stakeholders in either Digital or IT teams to transform organisational and functional performance
  • A strong understanding of the strategic and operational role of Digital or eCommerce functions within large corporates
  • Experience of best practices such as process and organisational maturity models, operating models, skills frameworks (BCS SFIA), change management methods, L&D
  • The ability to call upon best practice design methodology for Digital / eCommerce operating model
  • Excellent organisation, facilitation and presentation skills
  • Strategic thinker and problem solver – can simplify complex business challenges
  • Strong client communication skills and the ability to present and sell ideas to various audiences (technical and non-technical)

Nice-to-haves

  • Familiarity with working with cross functional business teams, particularly IT, Digital and Marketing
  • A passion and understanding of all things digital with the ability to converse with client in relevant topics
  • Knowledge of the Agile /Scrum delivery process
  • Understanding of IT organisations, functions, roles, activities
  • Strong time management skills and the ability to be self-directed when needed

Benefits

  • Market leading package, bonus and equity
  • Join a growing, professional and driven squad team
  • Make a huge impact in creating a unique company
  • Learn, develop and grow a part of a fast growing company
  • Have fun in relaxed environment where everyone is valued
job.briefdescription: The Digital Transformation Lead is key member of the senior team, helping our clients with their digital maturity journey and helping ANDigital grow the “professionalising digital” service.
